settings.custom_liquid: Use Code CYBERWEEK to get 30% off Select Products*

settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.footnote:
Terms & Conditions

*To access this offer, please enter coupon code CYBERWEEK at checkout on uk.hyperx.com to get 30% off select products advertised on https://uk.hyperx.com/collections/cyber-week-sale. Please note that not all product variants are eligible for this promotion. The coupon code will expire on 30/11/2023 at 23.59 GMT. Single use per customer. Available whilst stocks last. Requires acceptance of Terms and conditions of Sales and Service. Purchases made using voucher code must be for personal use and not for resale. Coupon code is non-exchangeable, non-transferable and no cash alternative is offered, except as required by law. This coupon code cannot be used in conjunction with any other coupon code or price reduction promotion. HP is not responsible for lost or stolen coupon code. HP reserves the right, acting reasonably and in accordance with all relevant legislation and codes of practice to change or cancel this offer at any time.
